paper.title: Research on the investment information automation problem based on the clustering analysis method
paper.abstract: This paper develops a two-step clustering method, and uses the data of China securities market to analyze the factors influencing the portfolio selection, and constructing an investment portfolio based on this clustering method. The results show that the performance of this portfolio based on the two-step clustering method is better than the traditional mean-variance model. The results indicate that this method is very important for the portfolio selection.

domain_result.justification: 该论文开发了一种两步聚类方法，并利用中国证券市场数据分析了影响投资组合选择的因素，构建了基于该聚类方法的投资组合。研究结果表明，该方法在投资组合选择方面优于传统的均值-方差模型，因此其核心技术主要应用于投资组合管理领域。
